to make new website: jekyll new ad2archive
to view website :  bundle exec jekyll serve
to view draft: jekyll serve --draft


to intall new theme

1. look for new themes for jekyll themes in internet

rubygems.org

2. edit gemfile by adding gem "nameofTheme"

3. go into command and run bundle install 

bundle install downloadall the repositries that are in gem file and yet not downloaded

goto _config.yml and replace the theme name their.
